DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and effects on lipids of FM-VP4 administered for 12 weeks in subjects with mild to moderate primary hypercholesterolemia.
DOC.brief_title: Study on the Safety and Effects on Lipids of FM-VP4 in Subjects With Primary Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Mild to moderate primary hypercholesterolemia Able to give informed consent and to comply with study procedures (including diet) Homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia Age <18 or >75 years Pregnant women or women of childbearing potential
